lead_paragraph: Many of last season’s top running backs have had a tough start. But the Jaguars’ Maurice Jones-Drew had 82 rushing yards and a touchdown last week against the Chiefs, reminding fans why the tandem of Jones-Drew and Fred Taylor drew so much attention a year ago.
